name: Terrorist Elimination
description:
GamePlay: Purchase guns and ammo in the store, kill terrorist in each stage/level to progress further in the game.

Features:

• FPS: Terrorist Elimination is a first person shooter

• Guns: M40A3, Dragunov, M16, AK47, Benelli M4, MP5, AEK-971, HKG36K, and more!

• Levels: Each level has 3 stages that need to be cleared out before unlocking more levels

• $Cash: Used to purchase guns and ammo in the store

• Loot: Terrorist guns, such as an ak-47 and the rpg can only be found in combat. Cash$ can also be found in combat.

• HardCore: No save/load, no hp or armor ui, and no checkpoints.
